title: E181 From Heroin to Hollywood: The Story of Mike Majlak - IMPAULSIVE EP. 181
itunes:title: From Heroin to Hollywood: The Story of Mike Majlak - IMPAULSIVE EP. 181
description:
In this emotional episode of IMPAULSIVE, we finally pick the brain of our boisterous co-host, Mike Majlak. After a decade of heroin addiction, Mike tells the story of his violent, illegal, and ill-fated past in honor of his book release,

“The Fifth Vital,” available now on Amazon:

https://amzn.to/2L59jNe

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
